verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִׁ֗יר <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song לְי֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשַּׁבָּֽת׃ <S%H7676><s%> for the sabbath ט֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> [It is a] good לְהֹד֥וֹת <S%H3034><s%> [thing] to give thanks לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD וּלְזַמֵּ֖ר <S%H2167><s%> and to sing praises לְשִׁמְךָ֣ <S%H8034><s%> unto thy name עֶלְיֽוֹן׃ <S%H5945><s%> O most High

לְהַגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> To shew forth בַּבֹּ֣קֶר <S%H1242><s%> in the morning חַסְֽדֶּ֑ךָ <S%H2617><s%> thy lovingkindness וֶ֝אֱמֽוּנָתְךָ֗ <S%H530><s%> and thy faithfulness בַּלֵּילֽוֹת׃ <S%H3915><s%> every night

עֲ‍ֽלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> with עָ֭שׂוֹר <S%H6218><s%> Upon an instrument of ten strings וַעֲלֵי־ <S%H5921><s%> and with נָ֑בֶל <S%H5035><s%> and upon the psaltery עֲלֵ֖י <S%H5921><s%> with הִגָּי֣וֹן <S%H1902><s%> with a solemn sound בְּכִנּֽוֹר׃ <S%H3658><s%> upon the harp

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שִׂמַּחְתַּ֣נִי <S%H8055><s%> hast made me glad יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> For thou LORD בְּפָעֳלֶ֑ךָ <S%H6467><s%> through thy work בְּֽמַעֲשֵׂ֖י <S%H4639><s%> in the works יָדֶ֣יךָ <S%H3027><s%> of thy hands אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <S%H7442><s%> I will triumph

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How גָּדְל֣וּ <S%H1431><s%> how great מַעֲשֶׂ֣יךָ <S%H4639><s%> are thy works יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD מְ֝אֹ֗ד <S%H3966><s%> are very עָמְק֥וּ <S%H6009><s%> deep מַחְשְׁבֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4284><s%> [and] thy thoughts

אִֽישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> man בַּ֭עַר <S%H1198><s%> A brutish לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no יֵדָ֑ע <S%H3045><s%> knoweth וּ֝כְסִ֗יל <S%H3684><s%> not neither doth a fool לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> Nor יָבִ֥ין <S%H995><s%> understand אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> זֹֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

בִּפְרֹ֤חַ <S%H6524><s%> spring רְשָׁעִ֨ים ׀ <S%H7563><s%> When the wicked כְּמ֥וֹ <S%H3644><s%> like עֵ֗שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> as the grass וַ֭יָּצִיצוּ <S%H6692><s%> do flourish כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all פֹּ֣עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> and when all the workers אָ֑וֶן <S%H205><s%> of iniquity לְהִשָּֽׁמְדָ֥ם <S%H8045><s%> [it is] that they shall be destroyed עֲדֵי־ <S%H5703><s%> for ever עַֽד׃ <S%H5704><s%> against
וְאַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> you מָר֗וֹם <S%H4791><s%> [art most] high לְעֹלָ֥ם <S%H5769><s%> for evermore יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> But thou LORD

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֪ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֹיְבֶ֡יךָ ׀ <S%H341><s%> For lo thine enemies יְֽהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> O LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> For הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אֹיְבֶ֣יךָ <S%H341><s%> for lo thine enemies יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <S%H6><s%> shall perish יִ֝תְפָּרְד֗וּ <S%H6504><s%> shall be scattered כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All פֹּ֥עֲלֵי <S%H6466><s%> all the workers אָֽוֶן׃ <S%H205><s%> of iniquity

וַתָּ֣רֶם <S%H7311><s%> shalt thou exalt כִּרְאֵ֣ים <S%H7214><s%> like [the horn of] an unicorn קַרְנִ֑י <S%H7161><s%> But my horn בַּ֝לֹּתִ֗י <S%H1101><s%> I shall be anointed בְּשֶׁ֣מֶן <S%H8081><s%> oil רַעֲנָֽן׃ <S%H7488><s%> with fresh

וַתַּבֵּ֥ט <S%H5027><s%> also shall see עֵינִ֗י <S%H5869><s%> Mine eye בְּשׁ֫וּרָ֥י <S%H7790><s%> [my desire] on mine enemies בַּקָּמִ֖ים <S%H6965><s%> that rise up עָלַ֥י <S%H5921><s%> against מְרֵעִ֗ים <S%H7489><s%> [my desire] of the wicked תִּשְׁמַ֥עְנָה <S%H8085><s%> shall hear אָזְנָֽי׃ <S%H241><s%> [and] mine ears

צַ֭דִּיק <S%H6662><s%> The righteous כַּתָּמָ֣ר <S%H8558><s%> like the palm tree יִפְרָ֑ח <S%H6524><s%> shall flourish כְּאֶ֖רֶז <S%H730><s%> like a cedar בַּלְּבָנ֣וֹן <S%H3844><s%> in Lebanon יִשְׂגֶּֽה׃ <S%H7685><s%> he shall grow

שְׁ֭תוּלִים <S%H8362><s%> Those that be planted בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <S%H2691><s%> in the courts אֱלֹהֵ֣ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God יַפְרִֽיחוּ׃ <S%H6524><s%> shall flourish

ע֭וֹד <S%H5750><s%> will still יְנוּב֣וּן <S%H5107><s%> They shall still bring forth fruit בְּשֵׂיבָ֑ה <S%H7872><s%> in old age דְּשֵׁנִ֖ים <S%H1879><s%> they shall be fat וְרַֽעֲנַנִּ֣ים <S%H7488><s%> and flourishing יִהְיֽוּ׃ <S%H1961><s%> become

לְ֭הַגִּיד <S%H5046><s%> To shew כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for יָשָׁ֣ר <S%H3477><s%> [is] upright יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> that the LORD צ֝וּרִ֗י <S%H6697><s%> [he is] my rock וְֽלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> is no [עֹלָתָה כ] (עַוְלָ֥תָה <S%H5766><s%> iniquity ק) בּֽוֹ׃
